website_summaries.verdict: One of the best premium bore bar sets to choose when you need more longevity from the tools.
pros: Shank design makes it easy to set positive and negative rake
Easy to replace cutting head with new inserts
Comes with a foam padded case for protecting the bar set
cons: Bore bars may require some modifications depending on the specific project

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Screw heads strip out making the tool unusable after the 1st edge is worn. Screws are too small to use an easy out so the tool is junk! Dont waste your money and time!
customer_reviews.author: Albert M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: I like the variety of lengths and diameters so you can eliminate chatter and bore smaller holes. They would be better if there was a flat for a set screw but it's easy enough to mill one. The scale on the shank is a nice feature but could be bigger and easier to read. All in all I'm happy with my purchase and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best part was price. But , you get what you pay for. They work but may require some modification depending on your application and setups. I milled a holder for it to set it on the tool post. Some may not have that option. If the top of the bar were machined flat it would fit in a post ok but they’re not.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle A. Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this set
customer_reviews.text: Solid bars and sharp inserts resulted in no chatter . Very pleased with this set.
customer_reviews.author: spicewoodtx

customer_reviews.title: very nice set
customer_reviews.text: shipping was fast, they came in a nice metal case, quality is very good for a China import. they seem very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I dislike because the boring bars do not have a flat spot either to adjust it to the center or that when it gets inserted, it is not on center.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: It's a Quality Tool
customer_reviews.text: For a middle-of-the-road priced tool set I found them to be very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Great for home milling
customer_reviews.text: Inserts fit well and cut well. I build custom knives from bar stock steel and use my mill for shaping steel and handles. Works great for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Cole

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely finished. Using them for boring through 1/2 plate metal.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Cates

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Husband said I ordered the right thing. 4 stars. Used for lathe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Accusize Industrial Tools 4 Pc 1/2'' Round Shank Indexable Boring Bar Set with Tcmt21.50 Carbide Inserts, 90 Degree, 2627-9104
feature_bullets: Round shanks allow the operator to set positive or negative rake. indexing the insert
Chip breaker eliminates long stringer chips. It is not necessary to remove tool from chuck or tool post
A new cutting edge may be presented by simply. Screw Down Style.
Positive Rake 90Degree Lead. Uses 0.050" key. C6 grade: carbide for steel and alloy steel.
1/4" I.C. carbide inserts fit all bars. Radius = 0.015”. Key = T8. Shank: 1/2". Piece per set: 4.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
